# Plume Theme

An easy-to-use and feature-rich vuepress documentation and blog theme

## Table of Contents

### Blog

- [How to Use Frontmatter](/en/article/ecxnxxd0/index.md)
- [⚠️ 1.0.0-rc.165 Breaking Change Notice: Blog & Notes Features Migrated to "Collections"](/en/blog/dk58a4t2/index.md)
